tour_name: Andalusian Passion: Seville, Granada & Costa del Sol

sections.title: Seville's Enchanting Embrace
sections.content: Begin your romantic journey in the captivating city of Seville. Immerse yourselves in its historic charm with a curated tapas walking tour, savoring the authentic flavors of Andalusia. Unleash your inner passion with a private flamenco class, experiencing the fiery spirit of this art form. Venture beyond the city to a traditional Andalusian cortijo, gaining insight into the noble tradition of brave bulls. Discover the pristine natural beauty of Doñana National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, with a private eco-tour, observing diverse wildlife and breathtaking landscapes.

sections.title: Granada's Splendor: Alhambra and Beyond
sections.content: Journey to Granada, a city steeped in history and romance. Be mesmerized by the Alhambra palace and Generalife gardens, a breathtaking testament to Moorish artistry. Wander through the labyrinthine streets of the Albaicín, Granada's old Arab quarter, soaking in its unique atmosphere. Experience the vibrant culture of the Sacromonte, known for its gypsy communities and cave dwellings. Indulge in a tour and tasting at one of Spain's oldest olive oil mills, discovering the secrets of this liquid gold. In the evening, enjoy a private dining experience at a Michlein star restaurant, savouring the best Andalusian cuisine.

sections.title: Costa del Sol: Coastal Relaxation and Exploration
sections.content: Conclude your honeymoon on the sun-kissed shores of the Costa del Sol. Settle into a luxurious resort in Marbella, where you can unwind on golden beaches and bask in the Mediterranean sun. Explore the charming city of Malaga, the birthplace of Picasso, delving into its art scene and historical sites. Enhance your experience with optional activities such as a private whale and dolphin watching excursion. For a truly unforgettable adventure, consider a day trip to Morocco, immersing yourselves in a different culture. Throughout your stay, indulge in the resort's luxurious amenities, savoring exquisite cuisine and breathtaking coastal views. Consider visiting a local wine yard for a private tour and a wine tasting with pairing.
